error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to encrypt_content_client.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
